title: Classy 1920's Font
content: Hi all, can anyone help me with my search for a classy/sophisticated looking font which is either from or has the feel of 1920's? Preferably the later end of the 20's too. From what I've seen so far, the fonts from that period tend to be less sophistication and more entertaining!
author: monkey.butter

comments.content:
Have a look at my Anziano which is inspired by Weiss from 1928. A pdf specimen for download is also available for better judging.

[http://www.macrhino.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220156/http:/www.macrhino.com/ "http://www.macrhino.com")
[Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220156/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=futura&q=Go) was developed in 1927, although I'm not sure that captures the spirit of the 1920s.

If you are looking for display faces try here  
 [http://www.nicksfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220156/http:/www.nicksfonts.com/ "http://www.nicksfonts.com/")

or here for more and text faces  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=1920s](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418220156/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=1920s "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=1920s")

Tim
